org.lenskit.results

Class Results

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.results.Results

  • public final class Results
extends java.lang.Object

    Utility functions for working with results.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BasicResult basicCopy(Result r)
      Create a basic result that has the same ID and score as another result (a basic copy of the result).
      static Function<Result,BasicResult> basicCopyFunction()
      Guava function that converts a result to a basic result.
      static Equivalence<Result> basicEquivalence()
      An equivalence relation that considers objects to be equal if they are equal after being converted to basic results (that is, their IDs and scores are equal).

      Create a new result with just and ID and a score.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static BasicResult create(long id,
                 double score)

        Create a new result with just and ID and a score.

        Parameters:
        id - The ID.
        score - The score.
        Returns:
        The result instance.

      • basicCopy

        public static BasicResult basicCopy(Result r)

        Create a basic result that has the same ID and score as another result (a basic copy of the result).

        Parameters:
        r - The result to copy.
        Returns:
        A basic result with the same ID and score as r. This may be the same object as r, since basic results are immutable.

      • newResultList

        @Nonnull
public static ResultList newResultList(@Nonnull
                               java.util.List<? extends Result> results)

        Create a new result list.

        Parameters:
        results - The results to include in the list.
        Returns:
        The result list.

@Nonnull

        Create a new result list.

        Parameters:
        results - The results to include in the list.
        R - the result type
        Returns:
        The result list.

public static ResultMap newResultMap(@Nonnull
                             java.util.List<? extends Result> results)

        Create a new result list.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        @SafeVarargs
@Nonnull
public static <R extends Result> ResultMap newResultMap(R... results)

        Parameters:

      • basicCopyFunction

        public static Function<Result,BasicResult> basicCopyFunction()

        Guava function that converts a result to a basic result. This is just basicCopy(Result) exposed as a Guava Function for use in processing lists, etc.

        Returns:
        A function that maps results to basic (only score and ID) versions of them.

      • basicEquivalence

        public static Equivalence<Result> basicEquivalence()

        An equivalence relation that considers objects to be equal if they are equal after being converted to basic results (that is, their IDs and scores are equal).

        Returns:
        The equivalence relation.

      • idOrder

        public static Ordering<Result> idOrder()

        Get an ordering (comparator) that orders results by ID.

        Returns:
        An ordering that orders results by ID (increasing).

      • scoreOrder

        public static Ordering<Result> scoreOrder()

        Get an ordering (comparator) that orders results by score.

        Returns:
        An ordering that orders results by score (increasing).
